name: Registry Value Alert
description: Registry Value Alert events report the detections and resolutions of registry value malicious access.

7.name: Delayed
7.description: Requires reboot to finish the operation.

reg_value.name: Registry Value
reg_value.description: The registry value that triggered the alert.

reg_value_result.name: Registry Value Result
reg_value_result.description: The resulting registry value; for example, if a Registry value operation is ALLOWED, the resulting registry value object can be included in the event.
